item.title: Americans Are Actually More United Than You Might Think
item.description: Americans think of our society as so divided. Might there be some upside to starting the new year knowing we aren’t as polarized as we thought?

item.title: Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt Settle Divorce After Eight Years
item.description: The settlement resolves a key part of the protracted end of their very public Hollywood romance.

item.title: Germany’s Chancellor Scholz Takes a Jab at Musk in New Year’s Eve Address
item.description: Chancellor Olaf Scholz said Germany’s election would “not be decided by the owners of social media channels” in his annual New Year’s Eve address.

item.title: Puerto Rico Power Outages Plunge Many Into Darkness on New Year’s Eve
item.description: Only a fraction of the island’s 1.4 million utility customers had power by midday. The electricity provider said it would take 24 to 48 hours to resto...

item.title: Victim of Coney Island Subway Immolation Is Identified by the Police
item.description: Debrina Kawam of Toms River, N.J., was burned alive on Dec. 22 in a videotaped killing that shocked New York.
